title: NBA COVID Realities, Bradley Beal, Battle For NY  | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | Ep 3 | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: NBA COVID Realities, Bradley Beal, Battle For NY  | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | Ep 3 | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On this weeks WHAT’S BURNIN’, Matt and Stak discuss the state of the NBA season as teams get hit hard by COVID-19 protocols. The boys share who is HOT and who is NOT, including some dominance from Bradley Beal and Luka Doncic. Plus, they look ahead to a big week of matchups, including the battle for NY and talk rookie performances so far this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
